name: ecommerce-microservices
description: E-commerce microservices with gRPC, PostgreSQL and Saga pattern

scripts.start:all: concurrently --kill-others --prefix "[{name}]" --names "PRODUCT,CART,ORCHESTRATOR" "npm run start:product" "npm run start:cart" "npm run start:orchestrator"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently --kill-others --prefix "[{name}]" --names "PRODUCT,CART,ORCHESTRATOR" "cd services/product && npm run dev" "cd services/cart && npm run dev" "cd services/orchestrator && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/product && npm install && cd ../cart && npm install && cd ../orchestrator && npm install
